org.ietf.nea.pb.batch

Interface PbBatchHeaderBuilder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    TnccsBatchHeaderBuilder, TransmissionObjectBuilder<TnccsBatchHeader>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PbBatchHeaderBuilderIetf

    public interface PbBatchHeaderBuilder
extends TnccsBatchHeaderBuilder
    Generic builder to build a TNCCS batch header compliant to RFC 5793. It can be used in a fluent way.

    • Method Summary
